title: The MZSH Command Line Interface - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: The Command line Tool mzsh is a command line interface to the system, and can be used to list, add and remove packages, or to regenerate and/or upgrade configurations. For further information about how to start mzsh and the available mzsh commands, see Command Line Tool Reference Guide . This chapter includes the following sections: Package Management Regenerate Configurations Configure Environment Name
